channel.title: Wrong slot?
channel.description: listen i know this has been said alot, i searched google too! nothing! i just added zamorak chestplate to my client, put it goes in the weapon slot! were do i go to change it to the platebody slot?

item.title: Wrong slot?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“aquikzebra, post:4, topic:355618”]Your going to want to go to your items.java. Search platebody or scroll and find it.

Next were it says platebodys, there will be a list of IDs, add the zamorak chestplate at the end of the list.

Compile and restart, and it should work.

-Will[/quote]
thanks man it worked

Read full topic

item.title: Wrong slot?
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Your going to want to go to your items.java. Search platebody or scroll and find it.

Next were it says platebodys, there will be a list of IDs, add the zamorak chestplate at the end of the list.

Compile and restart, and it should work.

-Will

item.title: Wrong slot?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Normally you need to make sure that you replace the correct type of item when you add a custom item. For example, replace the chest plate with a chest plate.

But if you look around you will find how to change item slots.

Read full topic
